item.title: AdGuard Home on a VPS
item.description: Learn how to set up AdGuard Home on a VPS and configure it to work with your router using WireGuard VPN. This setup will ensure that all DNS requests from your home network are routed securely through the VPN to AdGuard Home for filtering.

item.title: Timeshift - Automated Backups
item.description: Learn how to set up Timeshift on Linux to create automated snapshots of your system for easy recovery in case of issues.
